projects.title: Tweet 2 Poem
projects.name: Tweet2Poem
projects.description: A web app that takes a tweet and turns it into a poem

projects.title: Chit Chat
projects.name: ChitChat
projects.description: Genereate a conversation starter with this app, based on location, tone, age and other attributes. This app can help you stike a converstation with a stranger or a friend.

projects.title: Twitter History Bot
projects.name: TwitterHistoryBot
projects.description: A bot that posts interesting history facts and images each day.

projects.title: Simple Bingo Caller
projects.name: SimpleBingoCaller
projects.description: This app helps elderly play bingo in care facilities. It displays the ball in large and calls the number in multiple languages. Made for Amazon Firestick.

projects.title: Simple Hangman
projects.name: SimpleHangman
projects.description: An educational word game that is easy to use and fun to play.

projects.title: Loan tracking system
projects.name: LoanTrackingSystem
projects.description: This system helped the lender track loans, syndicator investments, sales commission and many other loan variables. Particular attention was payed to ease of use and compatibilty with accounting softwar.

projects.title: Games 4 Life
projects.name: Games4Life
projects.description: Games for elders that are designed so that they can understand and participate. Reached 100s of seniors with over 30 nursing home customers.
